General.Name: China World Trade Center Co Ltd
General.Description: China World Trade Center Co., Ltd. operates commercial mixed-use developments in China and internationally. The company's property portfolio includes China World Offices that provides office spaces; China World Mall with approximately 300 specialty shops; China World Hotel with 584-rooms and 69 apartment suites; China World Summit Wing, which comprises 278 guestrooms and suites, 4 restaurants, 2 bars and a lounge, 4 private dining venues, a spa, a health club, and meeting banquet and wedding facilities; and Hotel Jen with 450 guestrooms located in Beijing. Its property portfolio also comprises China World Apartments with a range of shopping facilities, such as shopping malls, hotels, and office towers; China World Century Towers that consists of 2 high rise residential blocks of 25 storey apartments with a total of 378 units; and China World Exhibition halls. In addition, the company provides commercial and residential property, hotel facilities, and health club facilities management services; and property management consultancy, property manager training, indoor and outdoor decoration and renovation, and mechanical and electrical plant installation and maintenance services. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No.1 Jian Guo Men Wai Avenue, Beijing, China, 100004
